name: Coba Mayan Ruins Tour
description:
This award-winning tour is one of the finest Mayan experiences available in Playa del Carmen.  Interact with real Mayan families and guides, who will take you on a sustainable tourism adventure through the villages, ruins and jungles of the Mayan Riviera. 

Ride zip lines, rappel into cenotes, canoe across lagoons, explore Mayan Ruins, and really experience the culture and intrigue of the Mayan empire of years past and as it exists today.  A great combination of adventure and culture in Playa del Carmen.
